segments.text: We're forming a study group to prepare for the finals . Do you want to join us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But the semester just started ? Why the rush ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After you try it once this way , I don't think you'll ever put off studying till the end again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We plan to get together once a week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We were talking about Wednesday evenings at the library , from seven to eight .
segments.speaker: S1
